doc:
Tom Skerritt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Skerritt 0 Thomas Roy Skerritt (born August 25, 1933) is an American actor who has appeared in more than forty films and more than two hundred television episodes since 1962. He is known for his film roles in M*A*S*H, Alien, Top Gun, A River Runs Through It, Up in Smoke, and the television series Picket Fences. Skerritt has earned several nominations and awards, including a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series in 1993 for Picket Fences. Thomas_Roy_Skerritt ( born August_25_,_1933 ) is an_American_actor who has_appeared in more_than_forty_films and more_than_two_hundred_television_episodes since 1962 . Skerritt has_earned several_nominations_and_awards , including a_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Lead_Actor in a_Drama_Series in 1993 for Picket_Fences .
